name: RTCRtpEncodingParameters.scaleResolutionDownBy
description: The RTCRtpEncodingParameters dictionary's scaleResolutionDownBy property can be used to specify a factor by which to reduce the size of a video track during encoding.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
